chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:

Hello,
ever ordered an iPhone 13 in green in very good condition (microscratches that are no longer visible at a maximum of 50cm) and received it.
Unfortunately, I only got an iPhone 13 in green in mediocre condition. The casing is full of deep scratches, with the paint severely damaged.

I would like to exchange for a device in very good condition. If there isn't a green one available, I'd also accept a black one. If this isn't possible, please refund.

Please respond if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Dennis Kraft

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
JH
